text: @realDonaldTrump This is a lie and this is not a competition or a game. Trump is solely focus on using the Coronavirus in anyway to help his reelection. Everything Trump does from now till November will have a hidden agenda to help his reelection.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
